name: Dune Betrayal
description:
Dune Betrayal is an indie game developed by Shahmuradov Games with the help of Unity course by GameDev.tv. It is a Real-Time Strategy (RTS) game where (max 4) friends can join via Steam and play together.

Features
  • Online Multiplayer support 
Controls
  • Mouse Left-Click on units to select them (you can also drag and multiple select).
  • Mouse Right-Click on a place to target your units.
  • WASD to move accross the map
